APPLICATION_NEW.NEW_APPLICATION_QUESTIONS:
__Welcome to the interactive setup of {{application}}!__

To start, just send the questions you want to add __in separate messages__.
There are a maximum of **30 questions**
Each of those questions have a limit of **253 characters** (discord limit)
Each question will time out __after 10 minutes of no response.__
Press "Cancel" at any time to cancel and "Continue" to continue in creating the application.
APPLICATION_NEW.DESCRIPTION_BODY: Would you like to set an application description? If so, send it and then press continue. If you send another message before pressing continue, it will edit the previous one. If you want to cancel, you can press the cancel button.
APPLICATION_NEW.REWARD_ROLES_BODY: Would you like to add any roles to automatically be given to the user upon being approved? If so, send them in any form (ie mention, id, name) then press continue. If you want to cancel, you can press the cancel button.
APPLICATION_NEW.REMOVE_ROLES_BODY: Would you like to add any roles to automatically be removed from the user upon being approved? If so, send them in any form (ie mention, id, name) then press continue. If you want to cancel, you can press the cancel button.
APPLICATION_NEW.REQUIRED_ROLES_BODY: Would you like to add any roles that applicants need to have before applying? If so, send them in any form (ie mention, id, name) then press continue. If you want to cancel, you can press the cancel button.
APPLICATION_NEW.NONE_GIVEN_MULTI: You can't continue, you haven't set any {{type}}
APPLICATION_NEW.NONE_GIVEN_SINGLE: You can't continue, you haven't set a {{type}}
APPLICATION_NEW.CUSTOM_COMMAND_BODY: Would you like to set a custom command for your application? If so, send it (without the prefix) and then press continue. If you send another message before pressing continue, it will edit the previous one. If you want to cancel, you can press the cancel button.
APPLICATION_NEW.COOLDOWN_BODY: Would you like to set a cooldown for your application? If so, send it (in milliseconds, without commas or periods) and then press continue. If you send another message before pressing continue, it will edit the previous one. If you want to cancel, you can press the cancel button.
APPLICATION_NEW.MIN_JOIN_TIME_BODY: Would you like to set a minimum time users have to be in your server to apply? If so, send it (in milliseconds, without commas or periods) and then press continue. If you send another message before pressing continue, it will edit the previous one. If you want to cancel, you can press the cancel button.
APPLICATION_NEW.PLEASE_VERIFY: Please verify that the settings below are correct, then press the continue button. If you want to cancel, you can press the cancel button.

CONFIG.IGNORING_APP: Ignoring application {{app}} because application already exists on this version of the bot.
CONFIG.DELETE_EXISTING: There are still existing submissions! If you would like to delete them all first, run this command again with `--force` at the end.
CONFIG.CHOOSE_PART: Choose which application option to edit
CONFIG.IGNORING_SUBMISSION: Not migrating a submitted application by <@{{user}}> because I could not find the position it is for.
CONFIG.NO_APPBUTTONS: You have not created any appbuttons.

DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_ADMIN_ADD: Adds an admin role to the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_ADMIN_REMOVE: Removes an admin role from the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_PREFIX_ADD: Adds a prefix to the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_PREFIX_REMOVE: Removes a prefix from the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_ADMIN: Gets the admin roles of the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_PREFIX: Gets the prefix of the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG: Get the config of the server
DESCRIPTIONS.PING: Gets the latency of the bot
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_BLACKLIST_ADD: Adds a blacklist role to the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_BLACKLIST_REMOVE: Removes a blacklist role from the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_REVIEW_REMOVE: Removes a review role from the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_REVIEW_ADD: Adds a review role to the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_REVIEW: Gets the review roles of the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_BLACKLIST: Gets the blacklist roles of the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_LOG: Sets or gets the log channel for the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_LOGPING_REMOVE: Removes a log ping role from the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_LOGPING_ADD: Adds a log ping role to the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_LOGPING: Gets the log ping roles for the server
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_ARCHIVE: Sets or gets the archive channel for the server
DESCRIPTIONS.POSITIONS: Lists all the positions of the server
DESCRIPTIONS.POSITION: Shows details for a specific application
DESCRIPTIONS.APPLY: Starts an application for the specified position, in DMs.
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_MIGRATE: Migrates all data from the v3 version of yourapps to the current version
DESCRIPTIONS.UPDATE: Git pulls the latest code and then restarts with pm2
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_DELETE: Deletes an application. THIS IS IRREVERSABLE!
DESCRIPTIONS.CONFIG_APPBUTTON: Lists all of the appbuttons set up for this server

COMMANDS.ARE_YOU_SURE_APPLICATION: Are you sure you want to apply to {{application}}? If yes, press continue. If no, press cancel. Continuing will DM you with the application questions.
COMMANDS.APPLYING_INFO: To apply for this application, just send a message and it will be filled in to the empty answer space, and the next question will be shown. If you mess up, you can cancel at any time by pressing the cancel button below. At the end, you will be asked to confirm once more, and then it will be submitted to the server who made this application.
COMMANDS.ARE_YOU_SURE_SUBMIT: Are you sure you want to submit this application to "{{application}}"? Please review your answers, and then press continue. Or, press cancel and nothing will be submitted.
COMMANDS.REVIEW_DESCRIPTION: Starts reviewing a submitted application, allows you to approve, approve with reason, or deny.
COMMANDS.REVIEW_EMBED_DESCRIPTION: Review the questions and answers below, then press one of the buttons to either approve this person, deny this person, or cancel reviewing. Once approved, the user will be given all reward roles and removed all remove roles.
COMMANDS.HELP_DESCRIPTION: Displays a list of commands, or detailed information for a specific command.
COMMANDS.REVIEW_NO_PERMS: I do not have permissions to manage roles, and this application has either remove roles or reward roles. Please give me this permission and then try again.

LANGUAGE.INVALID_LANG: `{{code}}` is not a valid language code. Valid language codes are: {{langs}}.
LANGUAGE.CHANGED_LANG: Your language has been changed from `{{oldCode}}` to `{{code}}`.

APPBUTTON_CREATE.GIVE_MESSAGE: Please give the content of the message to send in the provided channel.
APPBUTTON_CREATE.SELECT_APP: Please select the applications that this appbutton will have below.
APPBUTTON_CREATE.REACT: Either react with an emoji to use for the `{{app}}` part of the appbutton (shown next to the application name), or press skip for no emoji.
APPBUTTON_CREATE.INVALID_EMOJI: You cannot use a guild-specific emoji for appbuttons. Please use a default discord emoji and try again.

APPBUTTON_DELETE.DELETED_NO_MESSAGE: The appbutton was deleted, but I was unable to delete the actual message for some reason.

APPBUTTON_EDIT.PART: What about this appbutton would you like to edit?
APPBUTTON_EDIT.CONTENT_DESCRIPTION: Please send the content to edit the appbutton to below, and then press continue. Or, press cancel to cancel editing this appbutton.

BLOCKED.OWNER_ONLY: You cannot run this command, as you are not an owner of the bot.
BLOCKED.DM_ONLY: This command can only be run in DMs.
BLOCKED.GUILD_ONLY: This command can only be run in servers.
BLOCKED.ADMIN_ONLY: Only admins (people with the set admin roles or manage server permission) can run this command.
BLOCKED.REVIEWER_ONLY: Only reviewers (people with the set review roles or manage roles permission) can run this command.

ERRORS.CANNOT_DM: I cannot send messages to you, so you cannot apply for any applications. Please make sure direct messages are on in your settings for this server.
ERRORS.NO_REQUIRED_ROLES: You do not have any of the required roles set for this application, so you cannot apply to it.
ERRORS.PREFIX_EXISTS_V3: That prefix is already used by the v3 version of the bot. To prevent conflicts between the versions, please remove this prefix from the v3 version by running (replace <prefixhere> with the preifx, without the <>) `<prefixhere>config prefix remove <prefixhere>`
ERRORS.UNABLE_TO_FETCH: The bot was unable to find the member. The most likley cause of this is the member leaving the server. Since the member left, I will delete the submission.
ERRORS.NOT_JOINED_LONG_ENOUGH: You have not been in this server for long enough!
ERRORS.ALREADY_APPLIED: You have already applied for this application, please wait for it to be approved or denied before submitting another.
ERRORS.TRANSFER_GUILD_NOT_FOUND: No guild data was found from the v3 version of the bot. You likely never used the old version of the bot, and that means this command is useless for you.
ERRORS.COMMAND_ERROR_MESSAGE: Oh no! While running the command `{{command}}`, an error occurred. Please give the developers code `{{errorNo}}`.
ERRORS.NO_APP_SELECTED: You have not selected any applications, please do so and then press continue.

NO_SUBMISSIONS: There does not appear to be any submissions to review!
